Name: Tooth
Effect: at the start of battle, applies mark x1 to a random enemy.

Name: Mystery Brew
Effect: at the end of your turn, remove 1 weakened, blind, fragile, mark and injury.

Name: Wooden Pauldron
Effect: whenever you gain weakened, blind, fragile, mark or injury, gain 5 armor.

Name: White Shell
Effect: price of a random card becomes 0 in the market.

Name: Cursed Idol
Effect: gain 2 mark at start of battle.
